function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate adoption of partial isolation measures (IL < 0.5)","Impact":"Exponential growth of contagious diseases before reaching the peak","Mitigation":"Increase the adoption of isolation measures to a level greater than 0.5","Technologies":"Public awareness campaigns, enforcement of policies, and monitoring technologies","People":"Entire population, especially those at higher risk","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Ineffective epidemiological control with IL = 0.5","Impact":"Less efficient control of the infection curve compared to more stringent isolation measures","Mitigation":"Recommendation for a level of isolation greater than IL = 0.5","Technologies":"Public health guidelines, monitoring technologies, and data analysis","People":"Epidemiologists, public health authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Economic impact of isolation on wealth loss for A3 agents","Impact":"Higher wealth loss as isolation level increases, impacting the economy","Mitigation":"Strategies to support the economy and mobility of A3 agents at higher isolation levels","Technologies":"Economic support programs, remote work technologies, and business continuity planning","People":"A3 agents, business owners, policymakers","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, business associations"}]}
